message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30.  It's better to gain something now than risk inflation eating into the pot.
I think we can both do better than that. I'm offering you $45, which is still a good deal considering the inflation. Let's settle this before we lose even more money!
Bob, my friend, this back and forth is costing us both. I'll be generous - $65 for me, $35 for you.  Let's end this before inflation eats up even more of our potential gains!
